= 1 Android系统 =

<h4>adb命令</h4>
详细的Google查，最近用的几个：
adb shell screencap -p
adb shell screencap -p /sdcard/autojump.png
adb pull /sdcard/autojump.png
adb shell screenrecord /sdcard/xx.mp4
adb shell input swipe {x1} {y1} {x2} {y2} {duration}
